page.title: 04JOBS
page.content: Parents Jobs. Mums Jobs. Four Teachers, One Taxi Driver, One Hair Dresser, and other part time jobs. Fathers Jobs. One Youth Training Sceme Manager, One Sales Manager for Textile Machinery, One Doctor, One Deputy Manager for the Cable Cars at Matlock, Three Farmers, One Odd Job Man, one Concrete Brick Maker, One Architect, One Pharmacist, One Painter and Decorator, One Mechanic, One Person Who Owns A Vehical Repair Business, And One Who Makes And Sells Metal Detectors. Jobs we hope to do. Five children wanted to work on a farm, three as secretaries, three as hair dressers and two as firemen. The rest wanted to be a fashion designer, racing driver, horse rider, skier, gymnast, mathematician, motor cyclist or doctor
